# Makeup Artist Portfolio Website

This is a modern, minimalistic makeup artist portfolio website built with Next.js and TypeScript. The site focuses on showcasing makeup projects through high-quality photography with smooth animations and an artistic feel.

## Key Features
- Clean, minimalistic design with artistic touches
- Smooth scrolling animations using Framer Motion
- Project-based layout with photo galleries as the main focus
- Easy content management for adding new projects
- Responsive design optimized for all devices
- Fast loading with Next.js optimization

## Design Principles
- Photography-first approach - images are the hero content
- Minimal text, maximum visual impact
- Smooth, subtle animations that enhance UX
- Clean typography and generous white space
- Mobile-first responsive design

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Framer Motion for animations
- Optimized images with Next.js Image component

## Project Structure
- `/src/app` - App Router pages and layouts
- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/data` - Project data and content
- `/public/images` - Image assets for projects
- `/src/types` - TypeScript type definitions
